goal: Create a new directory for the project and initialize a new Python file named calculator.py

rules.name: Initialize Python File
rules.action: Create a new Python file named 'calculator.py' in the 'project' directory
rules.expected_outcome: File 'calculator.py' is created in the 'project' directory

rules.name: 智能体回退策略 - 使用coder
rules.condition: 当前任务执行失败且需要智能体能力时
rules.action: 使用备用智能体coder重新执行原任务

rules.name: Check for Existing Directory
rules.condition: No existing directory for the project
rules.action: Verify if the directory 'project' does not exist
rules.expected_outcome: Confirmation that the directory does not exist

rules.name: Verify Directory Creation
rules.action: Verify the directory 'project' exists and is accessible
rules.expected_outcome: Confirmation that the directory exists and is accessible
